content: the season s hottest look is this gorgeous crochet shawl that is light enough for cool summer evenings stitched in caron colorama bamboo blend this easy pattern is perfect for practicing double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet front post chain and tassel techniques select any color that complements your style for a must-have accessory of the season materials caron® colorama bamboo blend™ 8 oz/227 g 396 yds/363 m berry red 82010 2 balls or 592 yds/541 5 m measurements approx 60 152 5 cm wide x 30 76 cm deep excluding tassels
